name: FF 57+ (Nightly) Newtab
description:
Copy:
user_pref("browser.newtabpage.columns", 6);
user_pref("browser.newtabpage.rows", 5);
to \Mozilla\Firefox\Profiles\profilename\user.js

Copy css to \Mozilla\Firefox\Profiles\profilename\Chrome\userContent.css

Change width and height for your resolution (default for 1920x1080).
